title: Sport
text: My biggest hobby and interest is most definitely sports. As a kid, I started by playing football, then I switched to track and field and briefly played American football. Now, I’m back to doing track and field, and I can’t think of a hobby I would enjoy more.

title: Nature
text: Aside from sports, I love being outside to simply enjoy nature. I like going hiking and getting up early to watch a beautiful sunrise or to experience a quiet, slow morning with a fresh breeze on my face.

title: Adventure and Travelling
text: I'm always open to adventure and love the thrill of exploring the world in unconventional ways. Just like in this image series, when my friends and I went on a one-week trip to cross Europe without money, our phones, or knowing our starting point.

title: Photography
text: To capture the beauty of the world and remember everything I’ve done, I try to take pictures and videos whenever possible. Whether it’s with my digital or analog camera, or while flying my drone, I aim to capture the best moments and have a lot of fun doing it.
